column2: the last time we were there we brought our toddler with us and she was an absolute nightmare. However
column3: the staff were incredibly patient and attentive to our table despite my child's high energy. Sidenote: my child was always awesome whenever we took her out to a restaurant
column4: so we were at a complete loss with her random terrible two outbursts. I would say this place is okay for kids
column5: but maybe not the greatest for infants and toddlers since the bathroom did not have a diaper changing table and this was a few months ago. They do have highchairs though.
